title: Automation Rule Definitions
description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Rule Objects.

name.title: Rule name
name.description: Short (one word) user friendly description of the Rule.

tags.title: Rule Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Rule. They help to classify the rules and allow them to be found.

description.title: Rule Description
description.description: A brief description of what the rule is and for what it is used.

active.title: State
active.description: Shows if the pule is in active state or not.

config.title: Rule Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Rule. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Configuration Property
[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Property for configuring Rule or Module.

type.title: Configuration Parameter Type
type.description: Property declaring data type of the Configuration Parameter.

label.title: Configuration Parameter Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.

description.title: Configuration Parameter Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.

min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value
min.description: Minimum value of numeric types, minimal length for strings, minimal number selected options.

max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value
max.description: Maximum value of numeric types, maximal length for strings, maximal number selected options.

step.title: Configuration Parameter Step
step.description: A constant value for increasing/decreasing numeric types

pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
pattern.description: Regular script for subscribing text types.

readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter
readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.

multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter
multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.

context.title: Configuration Parameter Context
context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.

value.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value
value.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.

filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter
filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.

options.title: Configuration Parameter Options
options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.

on.title: ON Section
on.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Rule.

items.title: Trigger Module
items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.

id.title: Trigger id
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Trigger Module Type
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger.

label.title: Trigger Label
label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Trigger.

description.title: Trigger Designation
description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.

config.title: Trigger Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Trigger. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

output.title: Trigger Output
output.description: Contains pairs of Output id and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.

if.title: IF Section
if.description: Contains definitions of Condition Modules of the rule.

items.title: Condition Module
items.description: Defines the condition which permit to proceed with the Rule execution.

id.title: Condition id
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Condition Module Type
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Condition. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.

label.title: Condition Label
label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Condition.

description.title: Condition Designation
description.description: A brief description of what the Condition is and for what it is used.

config.title: Condition Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Condition. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

input.title: Condition Input
input.description: Contains pairs of Input id and Output reference in format - ModuleID : OutputID.

then.title: THEN Section
then.description: Contains definitions of Action Modules of the rule.

items.title: Action Module
items.description: Defines an action which has to be executed by the Rule.

id.title: Action id
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Action Module Type
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Action. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.

config.title: Action Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Action. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

input.title: Action Input
input.description: Contains pairs of Input id and Output reference in format - ModuleID : OutputID.

output.title: Action Output
output.description: Contains pairs of Output id and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.

name.title: Rule name
name.description: Short (one word) user friendly description of the Rule.

template.uid.title: Rule Template uid
template.uid.description: User for description of the Rule. It must be unique in scope of TemplateAdmin.

tags.title: Rule Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Rule. They help to classify the rules and allow them to be found.

description.title: Rule Description
description.description: A brief description of what the rule is and for what it is used.

active.title: State
active.description: Shows if the pule is in active state or not.

config.title: Rule Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Rule. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.
